00046 // ===========================================================================
00047 // static member variables
00048 // ===========================================================================
00049 std::vector<SAX2XMLReader*> XMLSubSys::myReaders;
00050 unsigned int XMLSubSys::myNextFreeReader;
00051 bool XMLSubSys::myEnableValidation;
00052 
00053 
00054 // ===========================================================================
00055 // method definitions
00056 // ===========================================================================
00057 void
00058 XMLSubSys::init(bool enableValidation) {
00059     myEnableValidation = enableValidation;
00060     try {
00061         XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00062         myReaders.push_back(getSAXReader());
00063         myNextFreeReader = 0;
00064     } catch (const XMLException& e) {
00065         throw ProcessError("Error during XML-initialization:\n " + TplConvert<XMLCh>::_2str(e.getMessage()));
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 void
00071 XMLSubSys::close() {
00072     for (std::vector<SAX2XMLReader*>::iterator i = myReaders.begin(); i != myReaders.end(); ++i) {
00073         delete *i;
00074     }
00075     myReaders.clear();
00076     XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 SAX2XMLReader*
00081 XMLSubSys::getSAXReader(SUMOSAXHandler& handler) {
00082     SAX2XMLReader* reader = getSAXReader();
00083     if (reader == 0) {
00084         return 0;
00085     }
00086     reader->setContentHandler(&handler);
00087     reader->setErrorHandler(&handler);
00088     return reader;
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 void
00093 XMLSubSys::setHandler(GenericSAXHandler& handler) {
00094     myReaders[myNextFreeReader - 1]->setContentHandler(&handler);
00095     myReaders[myNextFreeReader - 1]->setErrorHandler(&handler);
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 bool
00100 XMLSubSys::runParser(GenericSAXHandler& handler,
00101                      const std::string& file) {
00102     std::cout << "The file to be parsed: "<< file.c_str() << "\n";
00103     try {
00104         if (myNextFreeReader == myReaders.size()) {
00105             myReaders.push_back(getSAXReader());
00106         }
00107         myNextFreeReader++;
00108         setHandler(handler);
00109         std::string prevFile = handler.getFileName();
00110         handler.setFileName(file);
00111         myReaders[myNextFreeReader - 1]->parse(file.c_str());
00112         handler.setFileName(prevFile);
00113         myNextFreeReader--;
00114     } catch (ProcessError& e) {
00115         if (std::string(e.what()) != std::string("Process Error") && std::string(e.what()) != std::string("")) {
00116             WRITE_ERROR(e.what());
00117         }
00118         return false;
00119     } catch (...) {
00120         WRITE_ERROR("An error occurred.");
00121         return false;
00122     }
00123     return !MsgHandler::getErrorInstance()->wasInformed();
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 SAX2XMLReader*
00128 XMLSubSys::getSAXReader() {
00129     SAX2XMLReader* reader = XMLReaderFactory::createXMLReader();
00130     if (reader == 0) {
00131         WRITE_ERROR("The XML-parser could not be build");
00132         return 0;
00133     }
00134     if (!myEnableValidation) {
00135         reader->setProperty(XMLUni::fgXercesScannerName, (void*)XMLUni::fgWFXMLScanner);
00136     }
00137     setFeature(*reader, "http://xml.org/sax/features/namespaces", false);
00138     setFeature(*reader, "http://apache.org/xml/features/validation/schema", myEnableValidation);
00139     setFeature(*reader, "http://apache.org/xml/features/validation/schema-full-checking", myEnableValidation);
00140     setFeature(*reader, "http://xml.org/sax/features/validation", myEnableValidation);
00141     setFeature(*reader, "http://apache.org/xml/features/validation/dynamic", myEnableValidation);
00142     return reader;
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 void
00147 XMLSubSys::setFeature(XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE_QUALIFIER SAX2XMLReader& reader,
00148                       const std::string& feature, bool value) {
00149     XMLCh* xmlFeature = XMLString::transcode(feature.c_str());
00150     reader.setFeature(xmlFeature, value);
00151     XMLString::release(&xmlFeature);
00152 }
